p: In 2018, Spain reached an agreement with coal workers around the changing energy landscape [32]. In 2017, the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) put out a major report on just transitions written by the Just Transitions Centre [33]. At the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change COP24 there was considerable effort spent on just transitions [34]. Likewise, the preamble to the 2016 Paris Climate Agreement featured just transition language, as did House Resolution 109 calling for implementation of a Green New Deal introduced in the United States Congress in early 2019 [35].
